text: Richard John Cyril Allen (born 1 November 1963) is an English drummer. He has played for the hard rock band Def Leppard since 1978. His left arm was amputated because of a car crash in 1984. He is known as "The Thunder God" by fans. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English rock drummers Category:Heavy metal musicians Category:People from Derbyshire Category:Def Leppard members
title: Rick Allen
